name: Guru
text: Hey there, adventurer! I've got a stack of knowledge to share with you today. Ready to dive into the world of stacks?

name: Guru
text: Haha, your GURU reporting for duty! Alright, imagine a stack like a big pile of pancakes.

name: Guru
text: You can only add or remove a pancake from the top. We call it a LAST IN, FIRST OUT structure. Hungry yet?
